entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 14 April 2023
